# Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js e-commerce shopping application built with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and App Router. The project includes authentication features (signup and login) and product shopping functionality.

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all components and pages
- Follow Next.js App Router patterns
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling with modern, responsive design
- Implement proper form validation for authentication
- Use React hooks for state management
- Follow semantic HTML practices
- Ensure accessibility standards are met
- Use proper error handling and loading states

## Authentication Features
- Signup page with form validation
- Login page with form validation
- JWT token management (when endpoints are provided)
- Protected routes for authenticated users
- User session management

## E-commerce Features
- Product listing and display
- Shopping cart functionality
- Product search and filtering
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Modern UI/UX with clean aesthetics
